about_the_game:
Hit Revenant at warp speed with a new pack!

Stock up on Omega, PLEX, Skill Points, boosts, and more to make the most of the new expansion.

The Revenant pack contains:

  • 14 days Omega time - Get the complete EVE experience, including access to all the biggest and best ships. Get 10 x the EverMarks for completing Paragon missions.

  • 50 PLEX - Premium in-game currency to spend or trade.

  • 100,000 Skill points

  • 1 Basic Glamourex Booster

  • 1 Standard “Boost” Cerebral Accelerator - Train even faster for 4 days (or 8 days with the Biology 5 skill).

  • 1 Core Ship Operation Expert System - Enjoy 7 days access to EVE’s core skills.

  • Tholos Empyrean Outlaws SKIN

Single purchase per account.

name: EVE Online: Heart of Darkness Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: EVE Online: Heart of Darkness pack - $9.49 USD

package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Heart of Darkness Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM

short_description: Make the most of the new Revenant expansion with a great deal on 14 days Omega, 50 PLEX, one Standard “Boost” Cerebral Accelerator, one Core Ship Operations Expert System, and Tholos Empyrean Outlaws SKIN.

English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
